de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.debug.visualization
Class AbstractDebugTransformation

java.lang.Object
  de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.transformations.AbstractTransformation<org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable,de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode>
      de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.debug.visualization.AbstractDebugTransformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IKlighdDebug, de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.ITransformation<org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable,de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayDequeTransformation, ArrayListTransformation, BitSetTransformation, DefaultTransformation, DefaultTransformation2, EnumMapTransformation, EnumSetTransformation, HashSetTransformation, IdentityHashMapTransformation, KeyValueTransformation, LinkedHashMapTransformation, LinkedHashSetTransformation, LinkedListTransformation, ObjectValueTransformation, PriorityQueueTransformation, ReinitializingTransformationProxy, TreeMapTransformation, TreeSetTransformation, VectorTransformation, WeakHashMapTransformation
public abstract class AbstractDebugTransformation
extends de.cau.cs.kieler.klighd.transformations.AbstractTransformation<org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable,de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode>
implements IKlighdDebug

An abstract base class for transformations between IVariable and KNode.

At this point Xtend2 is used for all transformations specializing this class So every transformation make use of ReinitializingTransformationProxy to leverage create extensions or dependency injection with Google Guice

Author:
hwi

nextTransformation

public de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode nextTransformation(org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable variable)
                                                      throws org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException
Performs a transformation for a given variable. If a node already exists for the given variable a dummy node will be created. If the maximal depth isn't reached a normal transformation will be done. Otherwise a special KNode with simple informations will be created.

Parameters:
variable -
Returns:
result of the transformation, a dummyNode or a special node
Throws:
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException

nextTransformation

public de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode nextTransformation(org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable variable,
                                                             java.lang.Object transformationInfo)
                                                      throws org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException
Performs a transformation for a given variable with further informations. If a node already exists for the given variable a dummy node will be created. If the maximal depth isn't reached a normal transformation will be done. Otherwise a special KNode with simple informations will be created.

Parameters:
variable - variable to be transformed
transformationInfo - further informations needed by the transformation
Returns:
result of the transformation, a dummyNode or a special node
Throws:
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException

Iterate over field names given by fieldPath and returns the value of the last field of fieldPath stored in variable

Parameters:
variable - variable, in which the field with the first file name as name is stored
fieldPath - dot-separated string of field names
Returns:
value of last field of fieldPath or "null" if field does'nt exists

getVariable

public org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable getVariable(org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable variable,
                                                          java.lang.String fieldPath,
                                                          boolean superField)
                                                   throws org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException
Iterate over field names given by fieldPath and returns a variable representing the field in the variable with the last field name as name, or null if there is no field with the given name, or the name is ambiguous.

Parameters:
variable - variable, in which the field with the first file name as name is stored
fieldPath - dot-separated string of field names
superField - whether or not to get the field in the superclass of this objects.
Returns:
the variable representing the field with the last field name as name, or null
Throws:
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException

public de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode addNodeById(de.cau.cs.kieler.core.kgraph.KNode node,
                                                      org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable variable)
                                               throws org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException
Creates a node associated with the id of the runtime variable represented by the given variable or the given variable. If such a node already exists, a dummy node will be created

Parameters:
node - node to which the created node will be added
variable - representing a runtime variable
Returns:
created node or null if the created node is a dummy node

org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException
